strengths.title: SAP Controlling Expertise in SAP ECC & SAP S/4HANA
strengths.description: From concept to implementation – we design and deliver tailored controlling solutions in SAP ECC and SAP S/4HANA. With a deep understanding of processes and technology, we transform requirements into sustainable results

strengths.title: Bridging internal and external accounting for greater transparency
strengths.description: The requirements for internal and external reporting differ and are subject to varying rules and regulations. However, in certain areas, these differences can be bridged to enable a largely unified reporting approach. Aligning both reporting worlds reduces reconciliation efforts and creates greater efficiency

strengths.title: From concept to realization: Streamlined standardized chart of accounts tailored to your needs
strengths.description: Clearly defined logics in the design and structure of a group-wide (operational) chart of accounts unlock numerous advantages in customizing, account determination, group definition, reporting, and more. Transparent and binding rules regarding account class and account nomenclature ensure clarity and consistency. We know how to make it work – and we are ready to share our expertise with you

strengths.title: Driving profitability insights: multi-level contribution margin accounting in SAP Profitability Analysis
strengths.description: Multi-level contribution margin accounting helps you determine relevant KPIs at different levels of granularity – and leverage them for effective corporate management. Whether cost-based CO-PA, account-based CO-PA, or Margin Analysis in the Universal Journal – we support you in both conceptual design and implementation

strengths.title: Defining value flows in line with IAS/IFRS
strengths.description: IAS/IFRS place diverse requirements on the chart of accounts, account determination, value flows, profit and loss statement by cost of sales method, valuation, and more within the SAP system. With our expertise, you can map your business processes in a way that fully complies with international accounting standards

strengths.title: Group Standards, Change Management & Governance
strengths.description: Defining corporate standards and implementing them through effective change management and governance is key to the long-term success of any SAP initiative.We’re here to help you establish the right framework and conditions to ensure your project delivers lasting value and measurable results

strengths.title: Consolidation of group inventories & group production costs
strengths.description: Group inventories must be reported as of the reporting date. To enable this, group production costs must be determined in compliance with legal requirements. Beyond inventory valuation, these costs can also be integrated into cost object controlling and margin analysis to answer a wide range of business management questions. We are highly familiar with this topic and can provide valuable contributions to your project

strengths.title: Mergers & Acquisitions (Roll-in/Carve-out/Stay-in)
strengths.description: Organizational changes within a corporate group often require adjustments in the ERP system. Mergers & Acquisitions (M&A) need to be seamlessly integrated into the group structure, while divestments must also be properly reflected. We support you in managing these often complex and demanding tasks with confidence and expertise

strengths.title: From template creation to roll-out: ensuring SAP success worldwide
strengths.description: An SAP template defines the blueprint for group-wide standardized processes and the corresponding functional scope. SAP roll-outs ensure that the system configurations, business processes, and master data defined in the template are implemented and established consistently across the globe. With our expertise and experience, we help you make this ambitious endeavor a success

strengths.title: Tailored ABAP solutions – from concept to implementation
strengths.description: We are able to translate the technical aspects of our well-thought-out concepts into high-quality ABAP implementations. This means you don’t need to involve multiple vendors for suboptimal solutions. With us, you get the best possible technical realization for your business requirements – from a single, reliable source

services.title: Post-posting ACDOCA attribute assignment
services.description: The Margin Analysis in the Universal Journal enables the assignment of attributes to postings that are not part of the Profitability Analysis. This functionality applies exclusively to postings generated after activation. Existing postings can also be retroactively assigned attributes using this feature

services.title: Smart CO-PA characteristics derivation
services.description: Derivations in CO-PA often require support through ABAP coding. Intelligent ABAP solutions, designed with a focus on performance and transparency, enhance your data quality while simultaneously reducing posting runtimes

services.title: Reconciliation of Margin Analysis with Costing-based CO-PA
services.description: To ensure a smooth transition from Costing-Based CO-PA to Margin Analysis, reconciling both profitability analysis types is highly recommended during an S/4HANA implementation project. The reconciliation should focus on both values and characteristic derivations

services.title: Automated CO-PA allocations
services.description: As part of a standardized month-end closing, costs are transferred to their final cost centers in the Profitability Analysis. This process can be (partially) automated, saving both time and costs. By intelligently storing relevant system messages, straightforward ex-post analysis is ensured

services.title: Material Master governance including validation logic
services.description: The quality of material master data significantly impacts product costing, account determination, and material-related business processes. User-defined rules enable ad-hoc validation of material masters based on customer-specific criteria

services.title: Semantic ex-post validation of journal entries
services.description: Automated validation of postings against user-defined semantic rules is key to ensuring FI/CO compliance across your end-to-end processes. This approach improves quality in FATs, UATs, and regression tests while unlocking significant automation potential

services.title: Extension of master data
services.description: SAP master data can be extended to provide additional information transparently. These details can be leveraged in analyses or processes that consume master data, enabling better control and informed decision-making

services.title: Subcontracting purchase order item as cost object
services.description: A comprehensive set of tools is available for cost object controlling in production orders. When production is outsourced via “passive payroll processing,” key components of the controlling toolkit are no longer applicable. By defining the payroll processing order item as a cost object, this gap is effectively closed

services.title: Aggregated material price analysis
services.description: The aggregated CKM3N provides detailed insights into your material ledger–relevant business processes. Aggregation levels for material-based price analysis include company code, plant, and profit center. This functionality not only supports period-end closing in the production system but also proves invaluable during the implementation, expansion, and optimization of the material ledger

services.title: High-level expert ABAP workshops
services.description: organize comprehensive ABAP training sessions. In addition to syntax and semantics, participants learn advanced debugging techniques and delta trainings covering different ABAP releases (including 7.5e). Best practices for implementing real-world scenarios—particularly with a focus on performance and maintainability—are also presented
